data.title: Life’s a Game: How To Hack The System

data.text:
The game of Life would be so much easier if it came with a manual or a handbook.

Seriously, imagine if instead of printing a birth certificate for every child born, we printed out instructions for how to play life’s game instead.

It wouldn’t have to be a long document. Just one page with the words “WARNING: WATCH OUT FOR THOUGHTMILLS!” written in bold would be sufficient.

Game changer!

Yeah, that’d do it.

It would save us all a lot of time, effort, and heartache if they just warned us about thoughtmills on the way into the game.

But hardly anybody ever talks about thoughtmills.

As it turns out, understanding what thoughtmills are and how they work is literally the key to hacking the game of Life. If you’ve ever felt like your life isn’t working out how you planned or like the odds are stacked against you or that life just isn’t fair, then the chances are that you’ve fallen victim to a thoughtmill without even realising it.
